alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 23 at 2:51AM CDT until April 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 to 60 mph. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Saline and McPherson Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 AM CDT Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 7 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
